name: wordpress-manager
description: Unified WordPress management plugin for Claude Code. Orchestrates Hostinger MCP (infrastructure), WP REST API bridge (content), and WordPress.com MCP (hosted sites) with specialized agents, skills, and security hooks for multi-site WordPress operations. Includes local dev environment support for WordPress Studio, LocalWP, and wp-env. 24 skills covering development, testing, security, i18n, accessibility, headless, and operations.
